title: Emerald-Kissed Swarna Jhumkas: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: High-quality gold-plated alloy intricately set with dazzling cubic zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a central emerald-cut green gemstone (likely simulated emerald) and delicately dangling freshwater pearls. Hyderabadi-inspired polish for a radiant shine.
features: Classic Jhumka design, featuring a floral stud encrusted with CZ stones and a central simulated emerald. The dome-shaped Jhumka bell is adorned with an intricate openwork design, accented by cascading strings of pearl embellishments. The open work design provides a delicate yet sturdy feel, allowing light to reflect beautifully, enhancing its brilliance.
colors: complemented by the lush green of the simulated emerald and the creamy white of the pearls. The combination creates a rich
occasions: traditional Telugu ceremonies like Seemantham (baby shower) and Half-Saree functions. Equally stunning for upscale parties and modern celebrations.
description: These Jhumkas are a celebration of South Indian heritage, reimagined for the modern woman. The intricate detailing and the use of emerald and pearls evoke a sense of timeless elegance, while the high-quality CZ stones add contemporary sparkle. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these Jhumkas are a versatile addition to any jewelry collection, ensuring you make a statement at every event. A perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design.
